name: An Amazing Wizard
description:
Beautiful 2D roguelike with ranged-based combat!

  • 100 unique Spells to discover and merge into endless variations.
  • Use 200 enchantments on your basic spell and melee weapons!
  • 200 Artifacts items and 250 Elemental Upgrades will add unexpected twists to your run.
  • Each Elemental class has its subclasses!

Be a SUMMONER, MELEE BRAWLER, or THROW FIREBALLS with a boomerang effect.  

Story of the Wizard

Each wizard can cast spells of only one element, but there is a tale of a magical kid born once in a millennia. Without innate magic skills, mysterios hands cast any spell for him...
Someone has stolen your memories and forced you into this ever-changing world. Reclaim your memories, learn the whole truth about your power, and free yourself from this world!  

Epic Boss Battles

Each biome has distinctive mobs and elites. To get to the next level, you need to defeat the boss of the world. Beware, with each next iteration dimension upgrades itself and enemies learn new tricks, and become faster and stronger.

Everchanging Worlds

Explore 5 worlds, with each next one being distorted by Chaos more and more. Look for hidden rooms, complete challenges, fall into trap caves, and unlock more elements to help you on your journey. Psst. Don't bully the Shopkeeper.
